description: Try our easy to follow Homemade Stock recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Homemade Stock Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place carcass into a large stockpot with vegetables, herbs and peppercorns. Cover with 2 1/2 litres of cold water. Bring to the boil over medium heat.
Reduce heat and simmer uncovered for 3 hours, skimming as necessary. Set aside for 30 minutes to cool.
Strain stock into a large bowl. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Remove fat from surface. The stock can be frozen in sealed containers for 2-3 months.
